channel.title: Python 3.9 :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Updating to Python 3.9 In Fall 2022, the Codio software stack was updated to Python 3.9. This requires several changes to be made to the projects, which are described below. For Projects Already Started using Python 3.6 Uninstall all Python packages: pip3 uninstall -y -r requirements.txt Update the stack by going to the Project > Stack > Settings menu option.
